settings.title: As the owners of Footwear and Apparel NZ Ltd we welcome you to join us and look forward to being of service to you and your business.

settings.text:
We are a company operating nationwide through our online website and instore. We work with a wide range of national companies in the Construction, Civil, Food & Transport industriesacross to Corporates - Councils and Government Agencies. We work with businesses of all sizes to provide an efficient service that is tailored to meet the needs of all our customers and their employees.

Our footwear range is extensive covering footwear, both safety and outdoor, apparel and safety equipment. We distribute the Italian made footwear Grisport as well as Steel Blue, Apex, FXD and Bata.

A close second is Apparel, with an eye for stylish and functional options in a quality range of workwear, uniforms and corporate clothing. The addition of your company branding and logos will enhance your image.

We welcome you to visit our showroom located at 110 Whakatiki St, with easy access just off River Rd, in Upper Hutt or look online at Footwearandapparel.co.nz

Footwear & Apparel NZ Ltd - established for over 25 years is now privately owned and operated by Stuart and Rebecca Williams. Stu has over 20 years of sales experience in retail and wholesale markets. He is a Health & Safety professional, with a wealth of experience and a following of loyal and satisﬁed customers. You’ll enjoy meeting him and come to trust his opinion, looking to him for footwear, clothing and safety solutions.

Our team is well grounded and have an excellent grasp on products and their use.

Footwear & Apparel team are a professional team, have integrity, are knowledgeable in their speciﬁc ﬁeld and are dedicated to seeing your business succeed. They are constantly up-skilling and are wholeheartedly involved in the success of the company.

settings.caption: Footwear and Apparel, Owner
settings.heading: Stu
settings.text:
Stu has over 20 years of sales experience in retail and wholesale markets. He is a Health & Safety professional, with a wealth of experience and a following of loyal and satisﬁed customers.

You’ll enjoy meeting him and come to trust his opinion, looking to him for footwear, clothing and safety solutions. Easy going, with a great sense of humour!

| stu@faanz.co.nz
| 027 280 2394

settings.caption: Footwear and Apparel, Owner
settings.heading: Rebecca
settings.text:
Rebecca brings a fresh perspective to our team, having recently transitioned from a background in Hospitality, Retail, and Customer Service. Her love for organising shines through in her work, and she thrives in fast-paced environments where she can embrace the excitement of a bustling atmosphere. As a lifelong resident of Upper Hutt, she deeply appreciates the support received from local companies and is committed to fostering strong relationships within the community. With her enthusiasm and dedication, Rebecca is poised to provide exceptional service and make a positive impact on our clients' experiences.

Customer Services
